this is our hotel room in Brighton I was that and I stayed in that's our chandelier the wonky chandelier
didn't get any sleep ever that was her in the morning when she was like I just need to sleep cos it was so noisy I fell asleep at like eleven o'clock cos I'm so lame
and I'd been up since seven cos I drove down and um I fell asleep
where is that did you say?
in Brighton I drove down to Brighton last weekend

to see her and to see her Mum and her family and like our old haunts my old house and And uh I fell asleep quite early cos we got food and drink and just went back to the hotel room I fell asleep and sort of during the night I could hear noises outside in the night all the clubs and stuff cos our hotel was on the seafront so it's really central
and I could hear people but I just like sort of
be aware and then hiya and then roll over and I woke up in the morning like oh morning how're you feeling? and she was like I didn't get a wink of sleep last night

she was so frazzled apparently at three in the morning she went down to reception desk like hair wild in her pyjamas like are you taking the piss it's so noisy I can't sleep and they said um it's Brighton what do you expect?
she was like I expect a good night's sleep and they said well we can't move you cos the only other room is on the same side of the hotel and obviously I was schnoozing dead to the world

so she just came back to the room was like writing complaint letters like going on trip advisor and checking up all these reviews cos her sister had stayed between Christmas and New Year and had a really good time but I think it was quite quiet
people weren't really going out cos they were going out at New Year so it was a very different experience so she hadn't looked at the reviews when she booked it cos had said
she had such a good time so um

same hotel yeah so in the morning they wouldn't give us our money back all she'd paid they wouldn't give her her money back they said you know even in a Travelodge it'd be a hundred pounds a night in Brighton like it's never cheaper than that
so they gave her her money back to a hundred pounds and then gave us late checkout
but she was pretty frazzled for that entire next day I had to like push her round the seafront like come on we're going for a walk
that's not bad though um I mean at least that shows why it's good to complain at least cos at least you got something out of it
